title: Can people stop dodging because of team comp
body: ^ Legit the most anti-fun/toxic thing ever waiting 2-5mins to get into champ and then waiting another 5 for picks only to have some tard dodge because of team comps games don't even matter that much now.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Dream,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XMLYEaGV,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-12T05:58:59.391+0000)
>
> ^ Legit the most anti-fun/toxic thing ever waiting 2-5mins to get into champ and then waiting another 5 for picks only to have some tard dodge because of team comps games don't even matter that much now.

Do you mean people on your team dodging? Or the enemy team?
